summary: Avoid starting quest by force when enter Markarth for the first time.
descriptionHtml:
I don´t like getting forced to start a quest, like in Markarth which will put you in the prison. 
So I made this mod to avoid that killing scene and beginning of quest, no one will get killed and Eltry will not follow you just to start the quest.
This mod will keep some npc´s stay in the market 24/7.
author: ilasak93
